author: Tucker Reals
title: Coronavirus updates: U.S. tops 700,000 confirmed COVID-19 cases
description: The virus has sickened more than 2.2 million people worldwide.
content:
Hospitals in Japan are increasingly turning away sick people as the country struggles with surging coronavirus infections and its emergency medical system collapses.
